Key Match Events: Ivan Toney equalised with a penalty soon after on his first international start
Youri Tielemans scored in the 11th minute and 36th minute
Jude Bellingham scored in stoppage time to earn England a draw
Post-Match Reflections: Bellingham said, 'We should be winning with all the chances we've made but these are two games that will stand us in good stead. I know people will be negative but we have to take the positives.'
Southgate might not be happy with the early withdrawal of John Stones due to an adductor injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Belgium wore a bizarre kit of light blue shirts and brown shorts against England's charcoal grey
Bowen thought he had also made a case when he nodded in from close range after a 26th-minute corner but the goal was ruled out for offside
